sections.title: Party Plan Overview
sections.content: Meeting the demands of Party Planners requires insight into the needs of the Consultants for self-serve order management on the Internet. Party and Hostess Rewards management has never been easier. inPowerSuite provides effective and powerful tools for you and your Consultants to take your organization to the next level of Direct Selling success.

sections.title: Configurable Party Setup
sections.paragraph:
* Configurable party types, messaging, and ordering rules
* Configurable rules for host dollars and 1/2 priced items
* Configurable party auto-responders
* Easy to manage party schedule

sections.title: Party Management and Fulfillment
sections.paragraph:
* Track RSVPs, attendance, and future bookings
* Manage multiple order types: pre-party, party, rewards and settling order
* Cash out earnings at the end of a Party
* Ship directly to guests; or drop ship orders to the designated location
